channel.title: Layout on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Layout on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Container
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Container Service Datatype Description Layout containers are used in the customization of the Portal 4 customer experience. A single page in the portal can be thought of as a layout container. The container houses individual [[SoftLayer_Layout_Item|layout items]], which are the elements of the page (e.g., Ticket list). Layout containers can be added to [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile|layout profiles]], allowing for full customization of the container’s related items. seeAlso SoftLayer_Layout_Profile

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Item Service Datatype Description Layout items are used in the customization of the Portal 4 customer experience. Each [[SoftLayer_Layout_Container|container]] in the portal contains one or more layout items. These are used to describe elements such as ticket lists. Layout items typically have [[SoftLayer_Layout_Preference|default preferences]], which can be customized once the container is added to a [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile|layout profile]]. seeAlso SoftLayer_Layout_Profile SoftLayer_Layout_Container SoftLayer_Layout_Preference Methods getLayoutItemPreferences Retrieve the layout preferences assigned to this layout item getLayoutItemType Retrieve the type of the layout item object getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Layout_Item record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile Service Datatype Description Layout profiles are the primary object used to tie customized portal experiences to the [[SoftLayer_User_Customer|user account]]. In order to take full advantage of the flexible customization of the portal, each user must be given one or more layout profiles. Each layout profile is then assigned one of the [[SoftLayer_Layout_Container|layout containers]], thereby giving the user all [[SoftLayer_Layout_Item|items]] and associated [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preferences|default preferences]]. These default preferences can be modified via the [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile::modifyPreference()]] method, giving the user their own customized configuration.

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Containers
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Containers Service Datatype Description Methods createObject Associate a layout container with a profile editObject Edit the object by passing in a modified instance of the object getLayoutContainerType Retrieve the container to be contained getLayoutProfile Retrieve the profile containing this container getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Containers record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer Service Datatype Description Methods createObject Create a new layout profile deleteObject Delete a layout profile editObject Edit the layout profile object getLayoutContainers getLayoutPreferences getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer record. getUserRecord modifyPreference Modifies an associated layout preference modifyPreferences Modifies a collection of associated preferences

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference Service Datatype Description The profile preferences are an aggregation of the default preferences and the customized preferences. For each [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Containers|associated container]] on a [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile|profile]], the [[SoftLayer_Layout_Preference|default preferences]] are inherited through the profile preferences. However, any one of these may be overridden through the [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile::modifyPreference()]] method. Rather than maintaining two different sets of preferences, all preferences are grouped together through the profile preferences, presenting the customized preferences in place of the default preferences they are overriding.

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Container
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Container Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Container contains definitions for default page layouts Local id The internal identifier of a layout container Type: integer keyname The unique key name of the layout container, used primarily for programmatic purposes Type: string layoutContainerTypeId The internal identifier of the related [[SoftLayer_Layout_Container_Type]] Type: integer name The friendly name of the layout container Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Container_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Container_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Container_Type contains definitions for container types Local id The internal identifier of the container type Type: integer keyname The unique key name of the container type, used primarily for programmatic purposes Type: string name The friendly name of the container type Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Item Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Item contains definitions for default layout items Local id The internal identifier of a layout item Type: integer keyname The unique key name of the layout item, used primarily for programmatic purposes Type: string layoutItemTypeId The internal identifier of the related [[SoftLayer_Layout_Item_Type]] Type: integer name The friendly name of the layout item Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Item_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Item_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Item_Type contains definitions for item types Local id The internal identifier of the item type Type: integer keyname The unique key name of the item type, used primarily for programmatic purposes Type: string name The friendly name of the item type Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Preference Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Preference contains definitions for default layout item preferences Local id The internal identifier of a layout preference Type: integer layoutPreferenceTypeId The internal identifier of the related [[SoftLayer_Layout_Preference_Type]] Type: integer value The default value of the preference Type: string Relational layoutPreferenceType The type of the preference object Type: SoftLayer_Layout_Preference_Type

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Preference_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Preference_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Preference_Type contains definitions for preference types Local id The internal identifier of the item type Type: integer keyname The unique key name of the item type, used primarily for programmatic purposes Type: string name The friendly name of the item type Type: string valueExpression A regular expression used to validate the related [[SoftLayer_Layout_Preference]] Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Profile contains the definition of the layout profile Local activeFlag Active status of the layout profile Type: integer createDate Timestamp of when the layout profile was created Type: dateTime id The internal identifier of a layout profile Type: integer modifyDate Timestamp of when the layout profile was last updated Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Containers
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Containers Service Datatype Description Local createDate Timestamp of when the reference was created Type: dateTime id The internal identifier of the container reference Type: integer layoutContainerId The id of the referenced [[SoftLayer_Layout_Container]] Type: integer layoutProfileId The id of the referenced [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile]] Type: integer modifyDate Timestamp of when the reference was last updated Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer Service Datatype Description Local activeFlag Active status of the layout profile Type: integer createDate Timestamp of when the layout profile was created Type: dateTime id The internal identifier of a layout profile Type: integer modifyDate Timestamp of when the layout profile was last updated Type: dateTime name The friendly name of the layout profile Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference contains definitions for layout preferences Local createDate Timestamp of when the preference was created Type: dateTime defaultValueFlag Indicates whether this is a default value or not Type: integer layoutContainerId The id of the related [[SoftLayer_Layout_Container]] Type: integer layoutItemId The id of the related [[SoftLayer_Layout_Item]] Type: integer

Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Layout_Profile A skeleton SoftLayer_Layout_Profile object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_ProfileInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: modifyPreference
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile::modifyPreference Modifies an associated layout preference Overview This method modifies an existing associated [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference]] object. If the preference object being modified is a default value object, a new record is created to override the default value. Only preferences that are assigned to a profile may be updated. Attempts to update a non-existent preference object will result in an exception being thrown. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_ProfileInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ProfileObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference

item.title: modifyPreference
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer::modifyPreference Modifies an associated layout preference Overview This method modifies an existing associated [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference]] object. If the preference object being modified is a default value object, a new record is created to override the default value. Only preferences that are assigned to a profile may be updated. Attempts to update a non-existent preference object will result in an exception being thrown. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference

item.title: modifyPreferences
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile::modifyPreferences Modifies a collection of associated preferences Overview Using this method, multiple [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference]] objects may be updated at once. Refer to [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile::modifyPreference()]] for more information. Parameters Name Type Description layoutPreferenceObjects SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference[] Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_ProfileInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ProfileObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference[]
